description: This file provides a service layer for managing team data within a React application. It includes functions for checking backend API availability, fetching team lists, creating new teams, setting user team preferences, and managing local storage for fallback persistence. The code interacts with an API client and handles both backend and local-only scenarios.

methods.name: hasTeamApi
methods.description: Checks if the backend API for team management is configured and available.

methods.name: getTeams
methods.description: Fetches the list of teams from the backend if available; otherwise returns a sample list.

methods.name: createTeam
methods.description: Creates a new team via backend API or returns a local-only team object if backend is unavailable.

methods.name: setUserTeam
methods.description: Sets the user's team in the backend or simulates local persistence if backend is unavailable.

methods.name: getStoredTeam
methods.description: Retrieves the locally stored team selection from localStorage.

methods.name: storeTeamLocal
methods.description: Stores the selected team in localStorage for fallback persistence.

methods.name: clearStoredTeam
methods.description: Removes the locally stored team selection from localStorage.
